title: Supply, demand allocate resources in mkt economy

content.description: The allocation of resources in a market economy is described by which of the following statements?
content.question: The government decides which goods will be produced and which consumers will receive them.Buyers and sellers exchange goods and services on a voluntary basis.Prices and costs help producers decide whether they are producing too little or too much of a good.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
